body:
This should not be moved to a header file. The purpose of the pImpl pattern is to avoid putting dependencies in the header file on implementation details. Is there a subtle reason why the simple change didn't work? If so, we should work out how to fix that.

Holding off on a full review because the diff is hard to read because so much has moved around.
